argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ringlz.1 | |- Z = ( GId ` G ) |
| 2 |  | ringlz.2 | |- X = ran G |
| 3 |  | ringlz.3 | |- G = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 4 |  | ringlz.4 | |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) |
| 5 | 3 | #P_rngogrpo | |- ( R e. RingOps -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 6 | 2, 1 | #P_grpoidcl | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> Z e. X ) |
| 7 | 2, 1 | #P_grpolid | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ Z e. X ) -> ( Z G Z ) = Z ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_mpdan | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> ( Z G Z ) = Z ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. RingOps -> ( Z G Z ) = Z ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( Z G Z ) = Z ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( Z G Z ) H A ) = ( Z H A ) ) |
| 12 | 3, 2, 1 | #P_rngo0cl | |- ( R e. RingOps -> Z e. X ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> Z e. X ) |
| 14 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> A e. X ) |
| 15 | 13, 13, 14 | #P_3jca | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( Z e. X /\ Z e. X /\ A e. X ) ) |
| 16 | 3, 4, 2 | #P_rngodir | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ ( Z e. X /\ Z e. X /\ A e. X ) ) -> ( ( Z G Z ) H A ) = ( ( Z H A ) G ( Z H A ) ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( Z G Z ) H A ) = ( ( Z H A ) G ( Z H A ) ) ) |
| 18 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 19 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> R e. RingOps ) |
| 20 | 3, 4, 2 | #P_rngocl | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ Z e. X /\ A e. X ) -> ( Z H A ) e. X ) |
| 21 | 19, 13, 14, 20 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( Z H A ) e. X ) |
| 22 | 2, 1 | #P_grporid | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( Z H A ) e. X ) -> ( ( Z H A ) G Z ) = ( Z H A ) ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( Z H A ) e. X ) -> ( Z H A ) = ( ( Z H A ) G Z ) ) |
| 24 | 18, 21, 23 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( Z H A ) = ( ( Z H A ) G Z ) ) |
| 25 | 11, 17, 24 | #P_3eqtr3d | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( Z H A ) G ( Z H A ) ) = ( ( Z H A ) G Z ) ) |
| 26 | 2 | #P_grpolcan | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( ( Z H A ) e. X /\ Z e. X /\ ( Z H A ) e. X ) ) -> ( ( ( Z H A ) G ( Z H A ) ) = ( ( Z H A ) G Z ) <-> ( Z H A ) = Z ) ) |
| 27 | 18, 21, 13, 21, 26 | #P_syl13anc | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( ( Z H A ) G ( Z H A ) ) = ( ( Z H A ) G Z ) <-> ( Z H A ) = Z ) ) |
| 28 | 25, 27 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( Z H A ) = Z ) |
